snippet: The company, which is led by a number of former General Motors executives, is preparing plug-in hybrid vehicles initially for fleet and commercial customers.
abstract: The company, which is led by a number of former General Motors executives, is preparing plug-in hybrid vehicles initially for fleet and commercial customers.
lead_paragraph: Introduced on Tuesday, Jan. 10: Via Motors E-REV plug-in hybrid Silverado pickup, Suburban and Express Van.

headline.main: Via Motors: Big G.M. Trucks With Downsized Thirst
